content: p2* repeat 40 50 st round 53 *k4 p2tog k2tog p2tog* repeat 28 35 st round 54 *ssk k2tog p2tog p1* repeat 16 20 st round 55 *k2tog p2tog* repeat 8 10 st cut the yarn leaving an 8-inch 20 cm tail and thread it through the last 8 10 stitches twice 2 abbreviations k knit p purl st stitch es round round cn cable needle k2tog knit two together p2tog purl two together ssk slip slip knit slip 2 st knitwise return to left needle knit 2 together through back loops rli right lifted increase can substitute make 1 right lli left lifted increase can substitute make 1 left c4b cable 4 back slip 2 st onto cn hold to back k2 k2 from cn c4f cable 4 front slip 2 st onto cn hold to front k2 k2 from cn c4bp cable 4 back purl slip 2 st onto cn hold to back k2 p2 from cn c4fp cable 4 front purl slip 2 st onto cn hold to front p2 k2 from cn c3f cable 3 front slip 2 st onto cn hold to front k11 k2 from cn c3bp cable 3 back purl slip 1 st onto cn hold to back k2 p1 from cn c3fp cable 3 front purl slip 2 st onto cn hold to front p1 k2 from cn 3 4
